Text: So do we need a registration key? I put the crack in applications after the package install.

You don't need a serial number... unless you go to the registration dialog, then it will require a serial number... to fix, over-write the cracked version again and don't open the registration window again!

Even after doing the "setup" there was no Emic file to be found, then decided to open the crack and literally after it was the only file found on the computer. NOW WAIT A MINUTE, this fucker asked me to get only a SAMPLE and BUY, never hit the register button. I INSTALLED & UNINSTALLED TWICE, and nothing BUT YOU KNOW WHAT???? I FIXED THE MOTHERfUKER, I FOUND OUT WHAT WAS HAPPENING. 

When you do the set up and install, the fucking program never APPEARED in the APPS folder, even though during the process it was indicated that that's where it was going. SO, if you have this problem or wanna avoid it, select the DESKTOP folder during the install, once I did that the program finally appeared. Then I moved it to the APPS folder, and THEN, THEN YOU REPLACE that one with the one from the CRACK zip. Thanks again ADNAN. This motherfucker is fast!!!!!

nevermind my last comment. I figured out the problem. The installation was not putting the program in the Apps folder for whatever reason. TO FIX IT, during installation select ur desktop, then after install it will show, then move it to the Apps folder, AND THEN, replace it with the one from the crack zip. Thanks Adnan. This fucker is fast! No trial or registrations issues.
